- Stone Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:

- Inserter (position not specified)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the target position for the pipe connection is clear and not obstructed by other entities before attempting to connect pipes.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Verify the position of the entity you are trying to access. If an entity is not found, double-check the coordinates and ensure it exists at that location.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
